name: Communauté urbaine du Grand Reims
membership:
Member of the French Bioeconomy Cluster 
(for more details, see https://en.iar-pole.com/ )
goal: As a local authority, its remits deal with public policies  regarding 300 000 inhabitants and 143 municipalities, including sustainable development, bioeconomy and the scientific research funding on its territory. Therefore, Communauté urbaine du Grand Reims is deeply committed in the bioeconomy development at the regional level as well as at the European one.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Communauté urbaine du Grand Reims has a representative as a member of the European Bioeconomy  Stakeholders' Panel
